name: happy-hour-one-for-the-money
title: Happy Hour: One For The Money
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• A woman was arrested last night for trying to pass off a fake $100 bill at the Green Hills Walgreens. We’ve said it before and we’ll say it again: Keep an eye out for counterfeits, because getting caught with that would be tremendously uncool. [WKRN]
  • We might be flipping votes, but at least we’re not trying to register dead goldfish! (We hope.) [WSMV]
  • We’re expecting all-out civil war to break out in Murfreesboro any day now since the Republican HQ has fallen victim to some spray-painting, letter-writing, brick-throwing Anarchists. [WSMV]
  • A random search at Baxter Alternative School in East Nashville turned up a gun in a student’s backpack. [WKRN]

Photo by ericskiff.
